seo.title: Affordable Web Designer Belgium
seo.description: Looking for an affordable web agency for your business in Belgium to create a website or app? Look no further. Contact me.

hero.title: Affordable Web Designer & Developer Belgium
hero.text: Looking for an affordable web agency to develop a website/app for your business in Belgium? Look no further. Feel free to contact me.

image.alt: Person sitting at a computer desk with a desktop computer next to it.

contents.title: Services
contents.text: Are you from Belgium and tired of navigating through the confusing world of web design and web development alone? Look no further! As a freelancer with professional work experience since 2020, I develop digital solutions with a focus on your needs: website/webshop for your business with excellent SEO, CRMs, administrative application, and more. Everything that needs to be on the screen to improve your business and/or attract more customers to ultimately generate more revenue. As a freelancer, I am your only point of contact. I oversee your project and I finish it eventually. It doesn't matter if you live in Belgium or elsewhere. In addition to web design and web development, I also do digital marketing to make your business better online and guarantee more customer traffic. Contact me for a free quote or if you have any questions.

img.alt: Person in front of their laptop with charts.

contents.title: Affordable
contents.subtitle: $ to $$$
contents.text: As a professional website builder or web designer with a freelance web agency, I can offer cheaper services compared to your typical software companies in Belgium. Furthermore, I am the only person you communicate with, unlike software companies where you will meet different project managers and developers. So, people often pay way too much for what they get. These companies not only have to pay their staff, the costs they have to spend are much more complicated plus they often charge exorbitant monthly fees. For example, Duke and Duchess spent over 10K for their website. While they can just hire a freelancer to facilitate communication and spend less than 3K to develop the same solution.
